VO-TITLE-2.text: To start, press the green button!

VO-INTRO-3.text: That bird just took off with my wand!

VO-INTRO-4.text: Don’t worry, Abby! We’ll get it back!

VO-INTRO-5.text: We're on a wand chase! Let's go!

VO-WORLD-1.text: Where in the world is she going?

VO-WORLD-5.text: This is one fast flying bird!

VO-WORLD-7A.text: She's headed across the country to Alaska!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-AMERICA.text: Let's search in this fishing village in Alaska! This sure looks like a great place for an outdoor adventure!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-NIGERIA.text: Let’s check this school yard in Lagos. This sure looks like a great place to play!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-CHINA.text: Let's search this shopping street in Hong Kong. I bet this is a great place to try new food!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-MEXICO.text: Bienvenidos a Mexico! Let’s check this plaza in Guadalajara! This looks like a great place to meet up with friends!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-FRANCE.text: Oo la la! Let’s check this café in Paris! Mmm, looks like a great place to get a special dessert!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-BRAZIL.text: Let’s search this beach in Rio De Jinero! This looks like a great place to spend the day!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-INDIA.text: Let’s search this market in Mumbai! This looks like a great place to shop for beautiful crafts!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-1.text: {prompt} around to look for the bird!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-2.text: Let's keep looking for that bird!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-3.text: Come out, come out little bird!

VO-SEARCH-INTRO-4.text: Hmm, I wonder where that bird is hiding?

VO-SEARCH-CORRECT-0.text: Hmm, not there. But you’re on the right track! I’m pretty sure I saw her fly behind something {spanish-color}!

VO-SEARCH-CORRECT-2.text: But still no bird! Let's keep looking!

VO-SEARCH-CORRECT-3.text: No bird though. Let's keep looking!

VO-SEARCH-WRONG-0.text: Hmm, not there. You know, I think I saw her fly behind something {color}.

VO-SEARCH-WRONG-1.text: No bird there. I think I saw her fly behind something {color}.

VO-SEARCH-WRONG-3.text: I don't think shes hiding there.

VO-SEARCH-SOUND-2.text: She's not there, but I did see her fly behind something {color}

VO-SEARCH-SOUND-5.text: This will make a nice souvenir! That's a thing you keep to remember someplace you've been!

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-1.text: Go ahead, tap around to find where the bird is hiding.

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-2.text: Go ahead, click around to find where the bird is hiding.

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-3.text: Keep tapping to look for the bird!

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-4.text: Keep clicking to look for the bird!

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-5.text: I think I saw her fly behind something {color}.

VO-SEARCH-TIMEOUT-6.text: Try looking behind one of these!

VO-INTERESTING-AMERICA.text: Those are some comfy looking boots!

VO-WAND-INTRO-1.text: Oh! Don’t let her get away!

VO-WAND-INTRO-3.text: This is it! Let’s get my wand!

VO-WAND-INTRO-4.text: She’s not getting away this time!

VO-WAND-INTRO-5.text: {prompt} the wand to get it back!

VO-WAND-HIT-1.text: Give us back Abby's wand, por favor!

VO-WAND-HIT-2.text: Hola little bird. We really need Abby’s wand back, por favor!

VO-WAND-HIT-3.text: Excuse me, I need my wand back, if you wouldn't mind!

VO-WAND-MISS-1.text: Head her off at the pass!

VO-WAND-MISS-3.text: A little to the left! No, right!

VO-WAND-SUCCESS.text: I’ll be taking that back, thank you!

VO-WAND-DROP-1.text: We did it! We got my wand back!

VO-WAND-DROP-2.text: And we got to visit so many wonderful places around the world! Que bien!

VO-WAND-DROP-3.text: Thanks for all your help! We couldn't have done it, without you!

VO-WAND-TIMEOUT-1.text: Go ahead, tap on my wand to get it back!

VO-WAND-TIMEOUT-2.text: Go ahead click on my wand to get it back!

VO-MAP-1.text: Look at all these wonderful places we visited!

VO-MAP-NOT-2.text: {location}! Can't wait to check that place out!
